about_the_game:
How did this person die?! Use your deduction skills to find out! In this first-person view detective game, you will role-play as a medical examiner through several real-life, weird cases. Inspect the crime scene to gather clues, collect intelligence, examine the corpse and perform an autopsy.

The game will contain around 15 levels with mysterious deaths to solve. All the deaths are based on real events.

PHASE 1: EXAMINE THE SCENE


When you arrive at the scene, it is good to gather information from the people present. For example, the police consist of experts in their field who are used to these situations. However, do not take their information as necessarily true. You are a scientist, and as such, you must keep an open mind!


Instead of looking directly at the corpse, it is better to examine the entire scene. Some elements can provide crucial clues about what happened. A single detail can rewrite the story! For example, your UV light allows you to reveal blood traces even if they have been cleaned!


Finally, go examine the corpse, scan it, inspect it; you might already have some ideas about what happened before heading to the autopsy room.

PHASE 2: AUTOPSY


During the autopsy phase, identify any details on the organs that may indicate a problem. The organs do not lie about what happened.

content_descriptors.notes: This game will talk about (likely unusual) death of some people. Some stories will include murder, suicide and accidents that might shock some audiance.
